scripts.test:geth: npm run docker:run && npm run docker:wait-gas && npm run deploy:devnet && truffle test --network devnet && npm run docker:stop
scripts.docker:run: cd ./node_modules/@aragon/templates-shared/; docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d; RESULT=$?; cd -; $(exit $RESULT)
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run compile && npm run abi:extract -- --no-compile
scripts.deploy:arachain: npm run compile && truffle exec scripts/deploy_raw.js rpc --network rpc
scripts.deploy:rpc: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network rpc
scripts.deploy:devnet: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network devnet
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network rinkeby --ens 0xfe03625ea880a8cba336f9b5ad6e15b0a3b5a939
scripts.deploy:hatch: npm run compile && truffle exec scripts/deploy_raw.js hatch --network frame
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network rinkeby --ens 0x98Df287B6C145399Aaa709692c8D308357bC085D
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network ropsten --ens 0x6afe2cacee211ea9179992f89dc61ff25c61e923
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run compile && truffle exec ./scripts/deploy.js --network mainnet --ens 0x314159265dd8dbb310642f98f50c066173c1259b
scripts.publish:arachain: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:arachain | tail -n 1) --environment default --skip-confirmation true --propagate-content false
scripts.publish:rpc: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:rpc | tail -n 1) --environment default
scripts.publish:devnet: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:devnet | tail -n 1) --environment default
scripts.publish:staging: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:rinkeby | tail -n 1) --environment rinkeby
scripts.publish:hatch: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:hatch | tail -n 1) --environment hatch
scripts.publish:rinkeby: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:rinkeby | tail -n 1) --environment rinkeby
scripts.publish:ropsten: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:ropsten | tail -n 1) --environment ropsten
scripts.publish:mainnet: aragon apm publish major $(npm run deploy:mainnet | tail -n 1) --environment mainnet
scripts.deploy:dao:rpc: truffle exec scripts/deploy_dao.js rpc --network rpc $(aragon apm versions | tail -n 1 | cut -d ' ' -f 3)
scripts.deploy:dao:hatch: truffle exec scripts/deploy_dao.js hatch --network frame $(aragon apm versions --env hatch | tail -n 1 | cut -d ' ' -f 3)
